title: Skunk
description:
A skunk, a bushy-tailed mammal that sprays a foul odor when threatened. Depicted in full profile on all fours facing left, with black hair and its distinctive white stripe running from its head down to a curled-up tail.

Google’s original skunk design bore a humorously haughty air.
apple_vendor_description: The skunk emoji on Apple devices presents a charmingly rendered creature with a bold black body and a striking white stripe running down its back and bushy tail. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives its fur a soft, tactile appearance, while realistic lighting highlights its rounded features and curious expression. This emoji, with its distinct appearance, is often used humorously to signify something smelly, a surprising revelation, or a playful, albeit sometimes pungent, personality.
